statements: SELECT * FROM raw_materials
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_address FROM raw_materials
SELECT supplier_address, purchase_price FROM raw_materials WHERE purchase_price > 100
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM raw_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC
SELECT supplier_name, purchase_date FROM raw_materials WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers'
SELECT material_id, material_name, supplier_name, supplier_address, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM raw_materials ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE supplier_name='Supplier A' AND purchase_price < 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_address FROM raw_materials WHERE supplier_name='Supplier B' AND purchase_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01' AND supplier_address LIKE '%NY%' ORDER BY purchase_date
SELECT MIN(purchase_price), MAX(purchase_price), AVG(purchase_price) FROM raw_materials WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT material_name, supplier_id FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 2
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT m.material_name, br.timestamp FROM materials m INNER JOIN blockchain_records br ON m.material_id = br.material_id WHERE br.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT m.material_name, SUM(m.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM materials m INNER JOIN blockchain_records br ON m.material_id = br.material_id GROUP BY m.material_id;

SELECT br.transaction_hash, m.material_name, m.quantity FROM materials m INNER JOIN blockchain_records br ON m.material_id = br.material_id WHERE br.timestamp >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY br.timestamp DESC, m.quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials
SELECT material_name, origin_country FROM raw_materials WHERE id = 1
SELECT material_name, origin_country FROM raw_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, block_hash FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_id < 100
SELECT verification_status, verification_timestamp FROM material_records ORDER BY verification_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM raw_materials LIMIT 10;
SELECT material_name, origin_country FROM raw_materials WHERE origin_country = 'USA';
SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM raw_materials GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_records WHERE verification_status = 'verified' ORDER BY verification_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_details FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM production_records ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_records WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, origin FROM materials WHERE origin = 'USA' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_details FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'Europe' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_records WHERE production_date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY quantity_produced DESC;
SELECT block_id, timestamp, hash FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT raw_material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT transaction_id, raw_material_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT block_id, prev_block_id, blockchain_hash FROM blockchain WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT audit_id, transaction_id, action, audit_date FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'update';
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT raw_material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 100;
